options.responseText: *Diana gurgles, spitting blood onto the floor* Hans... that... absolute... incel psycho... *coughs violently* thought he could... purge this place...

followUpOptions.optionText: That bastard... I should've shot him myself.
followUpOptions.responseText: ...yeah... maybe next time... don’t hand enclave... a gun... brilliant move, genius... *blood dribbles down her chin* ...please promise me... *gulps blood* you'll take care of... Sir Whiskers...

followUpOptions.optionText: Sir Whiskers? Diana, what are you talking about?
followUpOptions.responseText: My cat... you idiot... *wheezes*... feed him... tell him... I loved him... more than... any of you losers...

followUpOptions.optionText: I’m sorry, Diana. I didn’t think he’d do this...
followUpOptions.responseText: ...you didn’t... *coughs* think at all... did you? he has... Mein Kampf... *wheezes* but hey... good job...

followUpOptions.optionText: I’ll make him pay. I swear.
followUpOptions.responseText: ...good... because he’s... *gulps blood* an absolute... nutjob... make sure it hurts...

*Diana’s eyes flicker with anger, her voice rasping despite the blood pooling in her throat* ...you’re just like... him... *coughs violently* ...twisted little... incel freak... *gulps blood* ...bet you think... this makes you... powerful... pathetic...

options.responseText: *Diana’s eyes narrow, blood bubbling from her lips* ...wait—are you fucking serious? *laughs, then chokes* hope your next blowjob from Hans comes with bullets... *smile fades*

auto_lines: *Diana weakly grips the edge of the bed as she looks up at you* ...figured... you’d be dead too... *gulps, her voice bitter* ...guess roaches like you... always survive...
